title: Bora, The Plate Knight
body:
Bora, The plate Knight is a Melee fighter that excels in zone control and maintaining a safe area around him.  he uses his passive to enable him to win short trades and using his signature attack Bone Breaker he makes sure that enemies need to think about how and when they should engage. and when things get dangerous he can use his ultimate to create a strong disincentive for the enemy team, not even including how he can throw himself far away escaping almost any engage.

Appearance:
Bora is A Plated Knight with well worn and Damaged Armor, a black tattered shawl is draped around his shoulders fastened with a Demacian Emblem. he carries a Large Metal Flail attached to a Broadsword by a long chain, this is Dragged behind him.
Bora doesn't march, or charge, he Slouches from the weight of his past and the Weight of his armor. his movements are Desperate But well practised.

Stats for Nerds

* HEALTH	560  ( +90)	
* HEALTH REGEN.	7.84 (+0.75)	
* ATTACK DAMAGE	56.5 (+2.8)
* ATTACK SPEED [*]	0.544 (+2.95%)
* MANA	317.12 (+31)
* MANA REGEN.	6.355 (+0.55)	
* ARMOR	30.5 (+3.8)
* MAGIC RES. 	30 (+1.15)
* MELEE	150	
* MOV. SPEED	350

> Passive: Plate Mail. Borra gains % bonus armor after not being attacked by an enemy champion for 5 seconds. this effect stacks up to 300% over 30/25/20/15 seconds. after being hit by a champion attack or ability the bonus armor decays over 2.5 seconds. 

~

> Q:Bone Breaker
> Cost 40 mana All ranks
> Cooldown 12/11.5/11/10.5/10 seconds
> Range 700 units 
> Width 80 units
> 
> Bora drags around a mighty Flail "BoneBreaker" which remains within 700 units of him. 
> Activating this ability sends bonebreaker towards targeted location but always stopping at the 700 unit radius. BoneBreaker deals 50/75/100/125/150 + 0.5 Bonus AD physical damage to targets hit however units near the targeted location take 65 / 105 / 145 / 185 / 225 + 0.5 AD physical damage. and have their armor reduced by 10/15/20/25/30 for the next 3 seconds. 

~

> W:Shatter.
> Cost 60/65/70/75/80
> Cooldown: 16/15/14/12/10 seconds
> Range 350 units 
> Width 45 degree arc
> 
> Bora Flings BoneBreaker in an arc at targeted location destroying all projectiles struck and dealing 40/50/60/70/80% of their damage to enemies within the flails range. slowing them by 60/65/70/75/80% decaying over 2 seconds. 
> If no Projectiles are destroyed then the slow is reduced by 50% 

~

> E:Advance
> Cost 50/60/65/70/70
> Cooldown: 18/16/14/12/10
> Range 200 units
> Width 100 units
> 
> Bora charges with his broadsword, Dealing  30/60/90/120/150 + 0.3 bonus AD Physical damage to units struck. 
>if bora hits "BoneBreaker" BoneBreaker flies to the 700 Range limit dealing 30/60/90/120/150 + 0.5 AD physical damage to units struck. 

~

> R: Great Flail
> Cost 100 All Ranks
> Cooldown: 160/140/120
> Range First Cast: 700 units
> Range 2nd Cast: 500 - 2000 units 
> 
> 1st Cast:  Bora Begins swinging his Flail around him dealing 100/150/300 + 0.5 Bonus AD over 2.5 seconds to all units nearby. During this time the Ability may be recast.
> During this time Bora moves at 25/50/75 % speed. 
> Units within 600 units of Bora take 50% damage. 
> 
> (Full Charge is at 1.25 seconds.)
> 
> 2nd Cast: bora releases his Flail flying 500 - 2000 units in targeted direction, dealing between 50/75/150 +0.1 AD and 150/225/450 + 0.5 AD Physical damage to 10% less damage for each additional unit hit, Minimum 40% damage. Units hit are knocked back 50% of the distance traveled by Bora.
